title:
Mixing angle between $^{3}P_1$ and $^{1}P_1$ states in heavy axial
  vector mesons within QCD sum rules framework
abstract:
In this study, we calculate the mixing angles between the axial-vector mesons
$^{3}P_1$ and $^{1}P_1$, specifically $D_{1(s1)} - D_{1(s1)}'$ and $B_{1(s1)} -
B_{1(s1)}'$ within the framework of QCD sum rules. Our results for the mixing
angles are smaller than those predicted by the Bethe-Salpeter, relativistic and
non-relativistic quark models. These angles can be measured by analyzing
various decay channels at experiments conducted at BELLE II, and LHCb.
